channel.title: CVE Feed for [Red Hat] -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for [Red Hat] -- all products

item.title: CVE-2020-10754|2024-08-04T11:14:15.561Z -- %5Bred%20hat%5D -- networkmanager
item.description: It was found that nmcli, a command line interface to NetworkManager did not honour 802-1x.ca-path and 802-1x.phase2-ca-path settings, when creating a new profile. When a user connects to a network using this profile, the authentication does not happen and the connection is made insecurely.
